title: Amz Rock
text:
To many people in many cultures, music is an important part of their way of life.AmzMohammad is a fan of rock music. and he have n rock tracks (labelled from 1 to n) now he wants to select a playlist.In his opinion a good playlist is one that have no two successive tracks.In how many ways?InputFirst line is the number of test cases.Each test case in an integer n (number of tracks.)OutputOutput number of good playlists he can make.Answer is less than 1000000000. it is the only constraint :)ExampleInput:2
1
2Output:2
3note: a good play list may consist 0 track :)note 2: how many Persian rock tracks we have?
